plist.dict:
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion English CFBundleDocumentTypes
CFBundleTypeOSTypes
**** fold disk
CFBundleTypeRole Viewer
CFBundleExecutable python
CFBundleGetInfoString %(appletname)s, a Python applet
%(cocoainfo)s

CSResourcesFileMapped
